page.title: 01BULKINGTON PARISH CHURCH
page.content: {ST.JAMES CHURCH.}The church is 725 years old.The roof of the church is about 150 years old,because the Victorians altered the roof.They highered the roof and added extra wings to the building.In a week they have 8 services.They also have collections and the money they collect goes to the church.The church will hold 400 people but usually only 300 people attend.In the tower there are 8 bells and 20 people ring them.The church was named after {ST JAMES THE {GREAT.}There are 3000 graves in the church yard but only 975 are marked with a stone.The oldest grave in the church yard is 298 years old his name was Perkins died 1717.The oldest women was Elizebeth Steen age 96 years old.
